about.description:
ASCII art is also known as "computer text art".
It involves the smart placement of typed special characters or
letters to make a visual shape that is spread over multiple lines of text.
ART is a Python lib for text converting to ASCII art fancy.

ASCII art is also known as "computer text art".
It involves the smart placement of typed special characters or
letters to make a visual shape that is spread over multiple lines of text.
ART is a Python lib for text converting to ASCII art fancy.

name: ascii-art
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "ascii-art" %}
{% set version = "5.9" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/art/art-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 6a311ec0a227c6554c6789e91e74c3f2c86453a2a8e76947788695b7a91ccff0

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python >=2.7
  run:
    - python >=2.7

test:
  imports:
    - art
  commands:
    - pip check
    - python -m art test2
  requires:
    - pip

about:
  home: https://www.ascii-art.site
  summary: ASCII Art Library For Python
  dev_url: https://github.com/sepandhaghighi/art
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  description: |
    ASCII art is also known as "computer text art".
    It involves the smart placement of typed special characters or
    letters to make a visual shape that is spread over multiple lines of text.
    ART is a Python lib for text converting to ASCII art fancy.
extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - thewchan
    - sepandhaghighi
    - sadrasabouri
